|zh                 = 
;今天是优菈的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''优菈：'''咳咳…唔，谢谢大家为我的生日准备了这么多。
:'''优菈：'''希望这支舞能护佑你们接下来的旅程一切顺利。
:（一曲结束，众人都沉浸在优雅的舞步之中。）
:'''派蒙：'''优菈刚才的舞步真好看！
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙看起来非常感兴趣呢。
:'''派蒙：'''嘿嘿…好吧，被你说中了。
:'''优菈：'''那来学一段怎么样？手抬起来…对，就是这样。
:'''安柏：'''哎呀，兔兔伯爵好像也很有兴致呢！
|dialogue_review_zh = 「那来学一段怎么样？手抬起来…对，就是这样。」
|en                 = 
;Today is [[Eula]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Eula:''' Ahem... Thank you for doing so much to celebrate my birthday, everyone.
:'''Eula:''' I hope this dance will be able to protect you as you embark on your adventures ahead, so that your journeys will always be smooth sailing.
:(The song comes to an end. Everyone is still mesmerized by the graceful dance.)
:'''Paimon:''' Eula's dance was so pretty!
:'''Traveler:''' Paimon looks really interested.
:'''Paimon:''' Heheh... Alright, you got Paimon.
:'''Eula:''' Why don't I teach you some of the steps, then? Raise your hand... That's right, just like that.
:'''Amber:''' Oh, [[Baron Bunny]] looks like it wants to learn too!
|dialogue_review_en = "Why don't I teach you some of the steps, then? Raise your hand... That's right, just like that."
